page.title: 11GAMES
page.content: AT SCHOOL MY FAVOURITE GAME IS SKIPPING.WE PLAY I'M A LITTLE BUMPER CAR WHERE YOU HAVE TO JUMP IN ,THEN JUMP OUT AND RUN ROUND THE BACK OF THE SKIPPERS ,THEN JUMP BACK IN AGAIN.WE PLAY BLUEBELLS AND COCKLESHELLS,AND DOWN THE MISTER ZIPPY.SOMETIMES WE JUST DO SKIPPING ON OUR OWN AND SEE HOW MANY TIMES WE CAN SKIP OVER THE ROPE. MY FAVOURITE GAME IS HORSES.YOU NEED AROPE AND YOU TIE IT ROUND YOUR FRIEND AND THEN RUN ROUND THE PLAYGROUND LIKE A HORSE AND A RIDER BEHIND. MY FAVOURITE GAME IS OFF GROUND TAG.YOUCHASE AFTER SOMEONE AND TAG THEM BUT IF THEY JUMP OFF THE GROUND ONTO SOMETHING YOU CAN'T TAG THEM,YOU HAVE TO WAIT TILL THEY RUN OFF AGAIN.
